about_the_game:
Listen to the music of the Multiverse wherever you are! Each environment in the Multiverse has its own music that helps set the mood. Each Villain has his or her own theme music they use to rally their troops.

Composed and performed by Jean-Marc Giffin, this soundtrack includes all music created for and appearing in Infernal Relics, an expansion for the “Sentinels of the Multiverse” video game.

This soundtrack is comprised of 320kbps MP3 files.
detailed_description:
Listen to the music of the Multiverse wherever you are! Each environment in the Multiverse has its own music that helps set the mood. Each Villain has his or her own theme music they use to rally their troops.

Composed and performed by Jean-Marc Giffin, this soundtrack includes all music created for and appearing in Infernal Relics, an expansion for the “Sentinels of the Multiverse” video game.

This soundtrack is comprised of 320kbps MP3 files.
